At Wattpad, we love stories. They’re our entire world. That’s why we have a dedicated team who spends time exploring our community, finding hidden gems, and amplifying great writing.

When we come across a story that excites us, we feature it as a Wattpad Pick for a limited time— either in a themed list for up to one month (think: Best of Paranormal or Funny Summer Reads), or on our official Featured List for two weeks—so new readers can discover what we already love about it.

With Wattpad Picks, each story is lovingly hand-picked by us (whereas the Hot list is determined by algorithms).

Think your story should be featured? Tag it #featured and apply here
